title: Pillanatnyi igék (-an/-en)
sentences: The balloon suddenly popped in my hand.
I heard a pebble splash into the water.
The light suddenly flashed in the dark.
The door clicked quietly when I closed it.
A bird suddenly flitted away from the branch.
The fire suddenly flared up in the wind.
The heavy sack thudded loudly on the concrete.
Everyone was stunned by the news.
The curtain fluttered softly in the draft.
A shadow glided past the window quietly.
The ice crunched under my foot.
The child plopped down onto the sofa tiredly.
The bus bumped loudly on the road.
The thief slipped quietly into the house.
The stranger was startled by the question.
Two cars bumped together quietly in the lot.
The coffee splashed out of the cup.
The floor creaked under my weight.
The dry leaves rustled quietly in the wind.
The stone thudded on the roof.
The ripe apple plop-dropped from the tree.
The lightning gave a huge crack/crash.
The mud made a squelching sound under my shoe.
The cat landed with a soft thud from the table.
dictionary:
Kidurrant - Popped
Csobbant - Splashed
Felvillant - Flashed
Kattant - Clicked
Elrebbent - Flitted
Fellobbant - Flared up
Puffant - Thudded
Megdöbbent - Stunned
Meglibbent - Fluttered
Moccant - Stirred
Elsuhant - Glided
Megroppant - Crunched
Pukkant - Popped
Lehuppant - Plopped
Döccent - Bumped
Besurrant - Slipped in
Megzizzent - Rustled
Elpattant - Snapped
Robbant - Exploded
Meghökkent - Startled
Összekoccant - Bumped together
Kicsobbant - Splashed out
Megreccsent - Creaked
Megvillant - Flashed
Megzörrent - Rustled
Koppant - Tapped/Thudded
Lepottyant - Dropped
Csattant - Crashed/Clattered
Cuppant - Squelched
Lehuppant - Thudded down
